bibl.title: Official and Private Violence in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Article delivered as paper in Boston, December 29, 1989, in a "Seminar on Comparative Approaches to the Social History of Roman Egypt", during the Annual Meeting of the American Philological Association.
